heroDescription: AD4TEC is a specialized factory in manufacturing and installing automatic vehicle & pedestrian gates, access control systems, and paid parking solutions â€” delivering security, durability, and precision for every project.
aboutDescription: AD4TEC is a specialized factory providing integrated solutions for automatic vehicle & pedestrian gates, access control systems, parking management systems, and metal fabrication. We combine advanced technology, certified materials, and professional execution to deliver secure and reliable systems across Egypt.
expertiseDescription: At AD4TEC, we combine engineering expertise, certified materials, and advanced technology to deliver secure and durable electronic gate systems, access control, and parking solutions for industrial and commercial projects across Egypt.
expertiseCard1Desc: Committed to strict timelines and professional project execution without delays.
expertiseCard2Desc: Approved products, trusted components, and compliance with industry and consumer protection standards.
expertiseCard3Desc: Ongoing maintenance programs and fast technical support to ensure system reliability.
servicesTitle: We deliver integrated gate & access solutions for modern facilities
serviceVehicleDesc: Manufacturing and installation of durable automatic car gates with advanced control systems for industrial and commercial use.
servicePedestrianDesc: Smart pedestrian gate systems integrated with cards, biometrics, and access control solutions.
serviceParkingDesc: Complete paid parking solutions including entry gates, ticketing, monitoring, and reporting systems.
aboutPageIntro: AD4TEC is a leading factory specializing in electronic gates, access control systems, and smart parking solutions, delivering secure and innovative systems across Egypt.
whoWeAreDesc: AD4TEC Factory was established to lead the market in providing electronic gate solutions, access control systems, paid parking management systems, and metal fabrication services including welding and electrostatic painting. We are committed to delivering high-quality products using the latest technologies and certified materials, ensuring on-time delivery, real warranties, and professional after-sales service.
ourVisionDesc: To become the first choice in Egypt and the Middle East for electronic gates and access control solutions by delivering innovative and efficient systems.
ourMissionDesc: Providing integrated solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and security, ensuring an outstanding customer experience for companies, factories, malls, resorts, and residential compounds.
contactDescription: We are always ready to answer your inquiries and provide the best technical consultations and quotations for your projects.
